infos.value: ...Phew. We've almost made it to the fortress.
It seems like it'll be an easy feat to take back the fortress since that so-called shooter Lu'Cia isn't taking aim at us.
...If that's the case, all the better. But...
Aah!
Salire!
My right shoulder's been shot. But I'm fine. The wound is shallow.
Your right shoulder, just like the others...
Ah... Could it be that Lu'Cia is purposefully aiming at our right shoulders!?
Why are we hiding here, sneaking around, huh?
It's our best chance...I suppose.
Wh-what the hell are you thinking!? At a time like this!?
Wait, don't move.
Figures. Not even you can take on this few opponents at the same time.
Ah!
Uh!
Wh-what's wrong!?
Idiot! Get down, quickly!
Do you not understand? They were shot.
From the top of the fortress.
From there...
Now we're in plain sight. That wench... Lu'Cia is enjoying tormenting us.
H-how do you know?
Everyone without exception has been shot in the right shoulder, correct?
She must be pleased with herself, watching them suffer.
So...what do you intend to do?
Escape back to Hourne and be tried for treason?
Or line your pockets with the mouthwatering bounty on Lu'Cia?
B-bounty...!? First I've heard of it.
I intend for us to storm the fortress and eliminate Lu'Cia.
The bounty goes to the one who brings her down.
A bounty... You're really going to pay up?
Glahz and I are different. I keep my promises. However...
There can only be one to bring her down.
Well, then. Make your choice.
The enemy is a remarkable marksman...
But if another group became her target, the others would be able to move in closer...
Then cutting her down shouldn't be that difficult.
Commander... You're going with us, right?
I've said it before. Glahz and I are different.
Then...I'm going. If we rush in all at onceâ€”
Right. No matter how good a shot she is, that'll overwhelm her.
So it's decided.
The we commence the all-out attack on the fortress. Our target is...Lu'Cia!
